name: Guide 2022 - Future of eCommerce
description:
There have never been as many opportunities in the ecommerce industry, nor has there been as much competition. Plummeting return on ad spend is pushing brands to prioritize customer lifetime value and promote brand loyalty.


Trust is the main currency of the future of ecommerce. Brands must be transparent, authentic, and readily available to their customers, especially where online consumers spend most of their time: on social media. Social ecommerce trends are at the center of online shopping for tomorrowâ€™s consumer, with brands investing in video and live shopping.
